mapper.select: SELECT social.uid,mid,realname,sex,school,phone,qq,student,graduateDate,age,social.pname,social.psname,pic.id pid,social.flag FROM ( SELECT uid,mid,socialme.name realname,sex,school,phone,qq,student,graduateDate,flag,age,p.name pname,ps.name psname FROM ( SELECT m.uid,m.id mid,m.name name,sex,school,m.mobile phone,i.qqNo qq,student,graduateDate,1 flag,m.provid provid,seat_provid, year(curdate())-if(length(i.idNo)=18,substring(i.idNo,7,4),if(length(i.idNo)=15,concat('19',substring(i.idNo,7,2)),null)) age FROM member m LEFT JOIN userinfo i ON m.uid = i.uid )socialme LEFT JOIN province p on socialme.provid=p.id LEFT JOIN province ps ON seat_provid = ps.id )social LEFT JOIN picture pic on social.uid=pic.uid ${sql1}
